name: 赏金物语 Bounty World
description:
版本: Beta0.2

语言: 简体中文

Version: Beta0.2

Language: Simplified Chinese

奇幻版本的回合制战斗的类似大航海时代的游戏。你扮演一名赏金猎人参与到各个势力的争斗中，在冒险旅途中你会遇到其他赏金猎人，他们会加入你的队伍或者成为你的敌人。“谁活着谁就看得见！”

赏金猎人

  • 可以和其他赏金猎人成为伙伴
  • 可以和其他赏金猎人成为敌人
  • 有些赏金猎人拥有独立的故事线

组建团队

  • 从若干种族/8+职业的赏金猎人中选择
  • 每个种族具有独立的属性成长、种族天赋
  • 每个职业具有独立的装备、技能
  • 每个职业具有多种养成流派

任务

  • 选择完成赏金猎人公会发布的主线任务
  • 选择完成酒馆发布的支线任务
  • 选择完成赏金猎人伙伴
  • 选择无视任何任务

赚钱方式

  • 完成赏金任务
  • 地下城寻宝
  • 其他

A fantasy version of a turn-based combat game similar to the Age of Discovery. You play a bounty hunter and participate in the battles of various forces. During the adventure, you will meet other bounty hunters, and they will join your team or become your enemies. "Whoever is alive can see it!"

Bounty Hunter

  • Can partner with other bounty hunters
  • Can be enemies with other bounty hunters
  • Some bounty hunters have their own storyline

Form a team

  • Choose from bounty hunters of several races/8+ classes
  • Each race has independent attribute growth and racial talent
  • Each occupation has independent equipment and skills
  • Each profession has a variety of development genres

Task

  • Choose to complete the main quest issued by the Bounty Hunters Guild
  • Choose to complete the side quest issued by the tavern
  • Option to complete bounty hunter companion
  • choose to ignore any task

way of making money

  • complete the bounty
  • Dungeon Treasure Hunt
  • other
